mapper.select: select * from ( select IFNULL(bsm.id,'') as id, IFNULL(bsm.remark,'') as remark , IFNULL(bsm.create_date,'') as createDate, IFNULL(bsm.worker_type_id,'') as workerTypeId, IFNULL(dm.name,'') as name, '1' as isSelfCreate from dj_basics_site_memo bsm inner join dj_member dm on bsm.member_id=dm.id where bsm.member_id=#{memberId} union all select IFNULL(bsm.id,'') as id, IFNULL(bsm.remark,'') as remark , IFNULL(bsm.create_date,'') as createDate, IFNULL(bsm.worker_type_id,'') as workerTypeId, IFNULL(dm.name,'') as name, '0' as isSelfCreate from dj_basics_site_memo_reminder smr inner join dj_basics_site_memo bsm on smr.dj_basics_site_memo_id=bsm.id inner join dj_member dm on bsm.member_id=dm.id where smr.specify_reminder=#{memberId} ) bwl order by createDate DESC
